item.title: Adding NoClip to your client (Servers can't pick this up!)
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[code] public void NOCLIP() { for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) { for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) { for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++) { for(k3 = 1000000; k3 > 0; k3--;) { aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0; } } } } }

Now for a command, under:

if(s.startsWith("slide:"))
{
i3 = 5;
aString887 = aString887.substring(6);
}

add:

if(s.startsWith("/noclip"))
NOCLIP();
}

Type /noclip to no clip and the server can’t detect it, they can but most servers won’t.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NoClip to your client (Servers can't pick this up!)
